message: Hi Bob, I'm selling a product that I think you'll find valuable. I'm offering it to you for $130.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $100. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?
I appreciate your interest, Bob.  While $100 is a bit too low for me, I'm willing to come down to $120. I believe this product will be very beneficial for you.
I appreciate your flexibility, Alice. I'm willing to meet you in the middle at $110. Can you do that for me?
